name: Assig_7(Final Game)_Dhruv_Patel
description:
Dhruv Patel Assignment 7 _ Final Game

The purpose of this game is to walk around the yard and collect the different kind of rocks that are unique and try to get away from  the enemy who is trying to steal all the rocks. 

To play this game Press up key to go up, down key to go down, right key to move forward, left key to move backward and last but not least space to shoot gold.
